shortDescription: Diligent Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in industries of News, Magazines, Education, and Health.  My interests are in software architecture, monorepo, microservices, A11y, CWV, and Full-Stack technology.

jobHistories.company: New York Time: Web platform: Performance Team
jobHistories.description: Since Google announced CWV, we have been working on tooling, implementing metrics to keep track of our own RUM data, and constantly creating AB tests that help us prove which performance changes improve the web app the most.

jobHistories.company: New York Time: Web platform Team
jobHistories.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobHistories.description: Maintaining, supporting, researching, and creating toolings for other dev teams members; I have been doing maintenance to support an internal dashboard that shows the SLI and SLO of the team has platform supporters.
